00011 basket::basket(
00012                 ngl::Vec3 _pos,
00013                 gameEntities *_m,
00014                 ngl::Camera *_cam
00015                 )
00016 {
00017 //initialze the basket
00018     //basket radius
00019     m_basketRad = 5;
00020     //basket position
00021     m_basketPos  = _pos;
00022     // the game entity mesh
00023     m_GameEntity = _m;
00024     //the camera
00025     m_camera = _cam;
00026     //basket's rotation
00027     m_basketRot  = 0;
00028     //set the basket/player's initial score to null
00029     m_basketScore = 0;
00030     //the initial shield for the player/basket
00031     m_basketShield = 10;
00032     //basket's flag to check if hit by stone, set to 'false' initially
00033     m_hit=false;
00034 }
00035 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 basket::basket()
00037 {
00038     //basket radius
00039     m_basketRad = 5;
00040     //basket position
00041     m_basketPos.set(0,-25,0);
00042     //set the basket/player's initial score to null
00043     m_basketScore = 0;
00044     //the initial shield for the player/basket
00045     m_basketShield = 10;
00046 }
00047 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 basket::~basket()
00049 {
00050     delete m_GameEntity;
00051 }

00053 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 void basket::drawBasket(
00055                         const std::string &_shaderName,
00056                         ngl::TransformStack &_transformStack,
00057                         ngl::Camera *_cam
00058                         )
00059 {
00060     //create an instance of the shader
00061     ngl::ShaderLib *shader = ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00062     shader->use(_shaderName);
00063 
00064     //the camera eye is set to basket's position
00065     ngl::Vec4 _pos;
00066     _pos.set(m_basketPos);
00067     _pos.set(m_basketPos.m_x,m_basketPos.m_y+30,m_basketPos.m_z-60);
00068     _cam->setEye(_pos);
00069 
00070     //transformations
00071     _transformStack.pushTransform();
00072     {
00073         _transformStack.setPosition(m_basketPos);
00074         _transformStack.setRotation(0,m_basketRot,0);
00075         loadMatricesToShader(_transformStack,_cam);
00076         //check if the basket is hit by stone
00077         if (m_hit)
00078         {
00079             // if yes, draw the mesh for hit basket
00080             m_GameEntity->draw("hitbasket");
00081         }
00082         else
00083         {
00084             m_GameEntity->draw("basket");
00085         }
00086         //draw the normal basket mesh
00087         m_GameEntity->draw("basket");
00088     }
00089      _transformStack.popTransform();
00090     glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK,GL_FILL);
00091 }

00093 template<typename T>
00094 void clamp(
00095             T& v,
00096             const T& m,
00097             const T& M
00098             )
00099 {
00100     v = std::min(M,std::max(m,v));
00101 }
00102 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 void basket::moveBasket(
00104                         float bx,
00105                         float bz
00106                         )
00107 {
00108     //updating the basket position in x and z axis
00109     m_basketPos.m_x += bx;
00110     m_basketPos.m_z += bz;
00111     // making sure that the basket stays in the permissible area
00112     clamp(m_basketPos.m_x,-s_xExtents,+s_xExtents);
00113     clamp(m_basketPos.m_z,-s_zExtents,+s_zExtents);
00114 }

00118                             float _rot
00119                           )

00121     //basket's rotation
00122     m_basketRot += _rot;

00125 void basket::reduceShield()
00126 {
00127     //reducing the shield value by 1 if hit by a stone
00128     m_basketShield = m_basketShield - 1;
00129 }

00135 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136 void basket::updateScore(int &_type)
00137 {
00138     //for falling chartype - fruit
00139     if(_type == 1)
00140     {
00141         //increase score
00142         m_basketScore+=100;
00143     }
00144     //for falling chartype - insect
00145     if(_type == 2)
00146     {
00147         //decrease score
00148         m_basketScore-=50;
00149     }
00150 }

00166 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00167 void basket::loadMatricesToShader(
00168                                     ngl::TransformStack &_tx,
00169                                     ngl::Camera *_cam
00170                                   ) const
00171 {
00172     ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00173 
00174     ngl::Mat4 MV;
00175     ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00176     MV=_tx.getCurrAndGlobal().getMatrix()*_cam->getViewMatrix() ;
00177     MVP=MV*_cam->getProjectionMatrix();
00178     shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
00179 }
